T02TD1926E:24a-1: ya m'a ri mandala no pi ka ya m'anta ko da ya n'a ma /
T02TD1926E:24a-3: gshin rje dgra'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD1926E:24a-4: dpal rdo rje khrag 'thung la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1926E:24a-5: rab tu mdzes pa'i sku 'bar thub dbang 'od tshogs can //
T02TD1926E:24b-0: rang 'od gnyis med 'khril zhing dpe bral bde @24b bas gang //
T02TD1926E:24b-1: rab chags mdzes pas lha dang khro bas 'khrugs lta la blo mnyam 'jug mdzad gshin rje gshed der mngon phyogs te //
T02TD1926E:24b-2: / rgyud rgyal yon tan mang ldan mkhas pa'i spyod yul ba //
T02TD1926E:24b-3: gshin rje dgra yid don la bdag blo blun gyur kyang //
T02TD1926E:24b-4: zhal gyi padma las rnyed de yi rjes 'brangs nas //
T02TD1926E:24b-5: dbang bskur sgrub bcas lo 'dab rtse tsam bya bar 'dod //
T02TD1926E:24b-6: de la dang por sngags pa ni //
T02TD1926E:24b-8: rnyed dang bkur sti la ma chags //
T02TD1926E:24b-9: rgyud 'dir gsang sogs dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1926E:24b-10: ri bo'i phyogs sogs 'byor pa yod //
T02TD1926E:24b-11: ljon shing gis bklubs yid du 'ong //
T02TD1926E:24b-12: skye bo 'dus nas rnam bral zhing //
T02TD1926E:24b-13: dris byugs me tog legs bkram par //
T02TD1926E:24b-14: dang por gdong sogs dag byas la //
T02TD1926E:24b-15: spro bas bde ba'i stan 'dug nas //
T02TD1926E:24b-16: snying gar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1926E:24b-17: ya sngon 'od dang ldan pa bsam //
T02TD1926E:24b-18: de 'od las byung rigs tshogs kyis //
T02TD1926E:24b-19: bla ma rdzogs sangs rgyas bkug nas //
T02TD1926E:24b-20: rnam thar gyi sgo dag byas te //
T02TD1926E:24b-21: dag par gyur pas mngon sum blta //
T02TD1926E:24b-22: gshin rje gshed por sgrub pa yang //
T02TD1926E:24b-23: bsod nams med par mi 'grub la //
T02TD1926E:24b-24: sbyin sogs bsod nams bya ba yang //
T02TD1926E:24b-25: dbul phyir bdag gis mi nus pas //
T02TD1926E:24b-26: tshe rabs sngon nas tshangs spyod bzhi //
T02TD1926E:24b-27: 'bras bu yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
T02TD1926E:24b-28: 'gro ba kun gyi don byed pa'i //
T02TD1926E:24b-29: ya nyid rab tu dran par bya //
T02TD1926E:24b-30: de las bdag nyid m'am sprul te //
T02TD1926E:24b-31: lan gsum bskor zhing phyag 'tshal bsam //
T02TD1926E:24b-32: de sprul rig ma'i tshogs rnams kyis //
T02TD1926E:24b-33: ma lus mchod pas mnyes par bya //
T02TD1926E:24b-34: lus ngag yid kyis sdig bgyis dang //
T02TD1926E:24b-35: bgyid du stsal dang yi rang gang //
T02TD1926E:24b-36: sgyu ma sgyu ma la sogs bzhin //
T02TD1926E:24b-37: thugs rje can rnams mdun du 'chags //
T02TD1926E:24b-38: sngon byas ma lus bshags nas ni //
T02TD1926E:24b-39: phyin chad de la mi 'jug cing //
T02TD1926E:24b-40: byang chub snying por gnas kyi bar //
T02TD1926E:24b-41: mi dge kun las ldog par bgyid //
T02TD1926E:24b-42: sangs rgyas de sras 'phags rnams dang //
T02TD1926E:24b-43: srid pa mthar phyin dam pa'i chos //
T02TD1926E:24b-44: skyabs kyi dam pa de gsum la //
T02TD1926E:24b-45: deng nyid gus pas skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1926E:24b-46: rnam rtog rgya mos rab bcings shing //
T02TD1926E:25a-0: @25a * // 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor nub pa kun //
T02TD1926E:25a-1: bsgral phyir bde gshegs nyid thob par //
T02TD1926E:25a-2: byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do //
T02TD1926E:25a-3: bde gshegs sras bcas 'phags skyes po //
T02TD1926E:25a-4: kun gyi dge ba kun bsdus la //
T02TD1926E:25a-5: sel med rab tu yi rang zhing //
T02TD1926E:25a-6: legs so zhes kyang bsngags par bya //
T02TD1926E:25a-7: dus gsum bde gshegs sras bcas kun //
T02TD1926E:25a-8: gshegs shing gshegs dang gshegs 'gyur ba'i //
T02TD1926E:25a-9: sbyin sogs lam gyi rang bzhin gang //
T02TD1926E:25a-10: ci yod stobs kyis yang dag bsten //
T02TD1926E:25a-11: yon tan rgya mtsho ldan rnams la //
T02TD1926E:25a-12: bdag nyid bdag gis dbul lags kyis //
T02TD1926E:25a-13: thugs rje mnga' ba khyed rnams kyis //
T02TD1926E:25a-14: so sor nang 'khor spyod du bzhes //
T02TD1926E:25a-15: gang zhig mya ngan 'da' bzhed pa //
T02TD1926E:25a-16: ji srid 'khor ba gnas par du //
T02TD1926E:25a-17: de srid mya ngan mi 'da' bar //
T02TD1926E:25a-18: thugs rje can la gsol ba 'debs //
T02TD1926E:25a-19: byang chub shing la gzigs rnams la //
T02TD1926E:25a-20: theg chen bdud rtsi rab bshad par //
T02TD1926E:25a-21: 'gro ba'i yab tu gyur rnams la //
T02TD1926E:25a-22: 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gang //
T02TD1926E:25a-23: lus ngag yid kyi dge ba gang //
T02TD1926E:25a-24: bgyis pa ma lus kun bsdus nas //
T02TD1926E:25a-25: 'gro ba kun gyi bde chen nyid //
T02TD1926E:25a-26: thob pa'i rjes su mthun gyur cig //
T02TD1926E:25a-27: de ltar bsod nams tshogs bsags la //
T02TD1926E:25a-28: gzhan don lhur mdzad thugs mnyes nas //
T02TD1926E:25a-29: rigs kyi bu khyod legs so zhes //
T02TD1926E:25a-30: gtang rag gnang nas mi snang gyur //
T02TD1926E:25a-31: rnam rtog rgya mtsho gting zab par //
T02TD1926E:25a-32: yang dag lta ba'i gru shor cing //
T02TD1926E:25a-33: sna tshogs lta bas g-yengs rnams la //
T02TD1926E:25a-34: thugs rje chen pos dmigs nas su //
T02TD1926E:25a-35: rang bzhin med pas stong pa nyid //
T02TD1926E:25a-36: rgyu dang bral bas mtshan ma med //
T02TD1926E:25a-37: rnam rtog med pas rnam bral bar //
T02TD1926E:25a-38: byang chub sems mchog bsgom par bya //
T02TD1926E:25a-39: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1926E:25a-41: lus ngag yid rnams ngo bo gcig //
T02TD1926E:25a-42: stong phyir de rnams brtags pa tsam //
T02TD1926E:25a-43: brtags pa yin phyir lus ngag yid //
T02TD1926E:25a-44: aom a'a: h'um yig gsum byas la //
T02TD1926E:25b-0: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du @25b ni ;
T02TD1926E:25b-1: / nam mkha' la gnas bsam par bya //
T02TD1926E:25b-2: de las a'a: chad byung nyi ma //
T02TD1926E:25b-3: de dbus yi ge h'um mthing las //
T02TD1926E:25b-5: lte bar yi ge h'um bcas bsam //
T02TD1926E:25b-8: de dbus padma zla stengs su //
T02TD1926E:25b-9: sam dkar las byung rdo rje las ;
T02TD1926E:25b-10: / kun bzang yum bcas bsam par bya //
T02TD1926E:25b-11: 'bru lngas de zhu la sa byung ba //
T02TD1926E:25b-12: chos dbyings dkar po gru gsum pa //
T02TD1926E:25b-13: gyen du gnas pa phyogs 'od bskor //
T02TD1926E:25b-14: padmo sna tshogs pam las skyes //
T02TD1926E:25b-16: ge sar dbus su kham yig las //
T02TD1926E:25b-17: sna tshogs rdo rje 'od tshogs can //
T02TD1926E:25b-18: lte bar bhr'um ser las byung ba'i //
T02TD1926E:25b-19: rig bcas rtag pa las byung ba //
T02TD1926E:25b-20: gzhal yas khang mchog gru bzhi pa //
T02TD1926E:25b-21: sgo bzhi rta babs mu khyud bcas //
T02TD1926E:25b-22: rdo rje ra ba 'od phreng bskor //
T02TD1926E:25b-23: dbus su rdo rje rgya gram mdzes //
T02TD1926E:25b-24: padma nyi ma'i gdan ldan bsgom //
T02TD1926E:25b-26: / lte ba'i gdan stengs bsam bya ba //
T02TD1926E:25b-27: aa dang a'a: mthar thug phreng gnyis //
T02TD1926E:25b-28: de las zla ba de yis brgyan //
T02TD1926E:25b-29: ka sogs dpe byad 'od ldan pa //
T02TD1926E:25b-30: zung gcig las byung gnyis pa ste //
T02TD1926E:25b-31: dbus su 'dod chags yi ge ram //
T02TD1926E:25b-32: des bzhu 'od kyi gong bu las //
T02TD1926E:25b-33: dkar dmar h'um ni rab tu bsam //
T02TD1926E:25b-34: de mdog rdo rje de yis brgyan //
T02TD1926E:25b-35: badzrod ko& ham nga rgyal bskyed //
T02TD1926E:25b-37: zhal gsum sngo dkar dmar ba la //
T02TD1926E:25b-38: rdo rje ral gri g-yas gnyis na //
T02TD1926E:25b-41: bde bas gang ba bsam par bya //
T02TD1926E:25b-42: rnam pa lnga yi rang bzhin gang //
T02TD1926E:25b-43: de ni sangs rgyas tgzugs brnyan no //
T02TD1926E:25b-46: snod du 'jig rten mthong nas su //
T02TD1926E:25b-47: rang snying las byung 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1926E:25b-48: khyab ste sna tshogs sangs rgyas byas //
T02TD1926E:25b-49: bkug nas bdag bzhugs pa yi //
T02TD1926E:25b-50: bde ba chen po nyid du gyur //
T02TD1926E:25b-51: mkha' la gnas pa'i yig 'bru lnga //
T02TD1926E:25b-52: ji ltar skar mnga' 'pho ba ltar //
T02TD1926E:25b-53: khar thim khu bar rab 'phros pas //
T02TD1926E:25b-54: rig dang bcas pa'i kun bzang zhu //
T02TD1926E:25b-55: 'od kyi gong bur gyur pa las //
T02TD1926E:25b-56: thig le phra mo bzhi chad de //
T02TD1926E:25b-57: byams sogs tsa rtsi k'a sogs kyis //
T02TD1926E:25b-58: snyan pa'i glu yis bskul ba bsam //
T02TD1926E:25b-59: rje btsun thugs rjes khro bzhengs la //
T02TD1926E:25b-60: gnas gsum kun gyi gti mug spongs //
T02TD1926E:26a-2: rje btsun khros pa'i thugs kyis bzhengs //
T02TD1926E:26a-3: 'jig rten mgron gnyer stong gnas shing //
T02TD1926E:26a-4: rje btsun 'jig rten bsod nams bzhengs //
T02TD1926E:26a-6: khyod ni stong dmigs ci ste bzhugs //
T02TD1926E:26a-7: 'jig rten byang chub rang bzhin mgron //
T02TD1926E:26a-8: 'dod chags la ni dga' ba yis //
T02TD1926E:26a-9: zhu ba la ni bskul nas su //
T02TD1926E:26a-10: de nyid la thim yang sngon gyur //
T02TD1926E:26a-11: rdo rje las byung mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1926E:26a-12: g-yas g-yon dkar dang dmar ba la //
T02TD1926E:26a-13: 'od 'bar mthing ga sngon mtshungs phyag / rgyan kun bklubs pa'i sbrul gyis bcings //
T02TD1926E:26a-16: sku de byang chub sems mchog go //
T02TD1926E:26a-17: aom sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1926E:26a-19: gsang byin brlab dang rjes chags ni //
T02TD1926E:26a-20: rgyud 'dir bdag gis mthong med kyang //
T02TD1926E:26a-22: byin rlabs rjes chags bya bar 'os //
T02TD1926E:26a-23: rang snying sa bon 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1926E:26a-24: mkha' khyab bde gshegs kun bkug nas //
T02TD1926E:26a-25: rdo rje las byung pad lte la //
T02TD1926E:26a-26: bde ba'i rgyun du 'phros par bsam //
T02TD1926E:26a-27: dga' ba'i thig le sa bon ni //
T02TD1926E:26a-29: de las thugs kyi phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1926E:26a-30: de las phyag rgya chen por blta //
T02TD1926E:26a-31: snod chen bzhi yang rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD1926E:26a-32: blo ldan phyir rol spro bar bya //
T02TD1926E:26a-33: hr'i:shti: la sogs gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD1926E:26a-34: zhe sdang mthing ga rdo rje dang //
T02TD1926E:26a-36: spros nas slar byon bdag la thim //
T02TD1926E:26a-37: dzin dzik ces brjod pa yis //
T02TD1926E:26a-39: 'khor lo ral gri rin chen pad //
T02TD1926E:26a-40: mkha' las bton nas shar phyogs su //
T02TD1926E:26a-41: lho phyogs rdo rje'i rang nyid las//
T02TD1926E:26a-42: ratna dhrik gis ser sna ni //
T02TD1926E:26a-43: btso ma gser dang mtshungs pa'i mdog / rin chen ral gri 'khor lo pad //
T02TD1926E:26a-44: a'a ro lik gis nub phyogs su //
T02TD1926E:26a-46: padma dang ni ral gri dang //
T02TD1926E:26a-47: 'khor lo rin chen 'chang ba mchog / pradzny'a dhrik ces bya ba yis //
T02TD1926E:26a-48: byang du phrag dog chen po ste //
T02TD1926E:26a-49: sngo bsangs ral gri rdo rje dang //
T02TD1926E:26a-51: mung+gar dhrik gis de bzhin te //
T02TD1926E:26a-52: sngon po tho ba ral gri dang //
T02TD1926E:26a-54: shar gyi sgo ru bsam par bya //
T02TD1926E:26a-55: danda dhrik ces bya ba yis //
T02TD1926E:26a-56: be con 'dzin pa dkar ba ste //
T02TD1926E:26a-57: be con ral gri 'khor lo pad //
T02TD1926E:26b-0: lho yi sgo ru @26b bsam par bya //
T02TD1926E:26b-1: padma dhrik gis nub sgo ru //
T02TD1926E:26b-3: padma ral gri rdo rje dang //
T02TD1926E:26b-4: rin chen 'dzin pa bsam par bya //
T02TD1926E:26b-5: khadga dhrik gis byang sgo ru //
T02TD1926E:26b-6: ljang gu ral gri 'dzin pa ste //
T02TD1926E:26b-7: ral gri rdo rje 'khor lo can //
T02TD1926E:26b-9: dve sha ra ti zhes de nyid /
T02TD1926E:26b-10: tsa rtsi k'a mdog dkar mo la //
T02TD1926E:26b-11: gtso bo dang mtshungs phyag mtshan can //
T02TD1926E:26b-12: me yi phyogs su legs par gzhag / mo ha ra ti zhes pa yis //
T02TD1926E:26b-13: phag mo sku mdog sngon mo la //
T02TD1926E:26b-14: rang gi gtso bo'i phyag rgya can //
T02TD1926E:26b-15: spros nas bden bral grva la'o //
T02TD1926E:26b-16: r'a gar ti zhes sngags kyis //
T02TD1926E:26b-17: dbyangs can ma ni dmar mo la //
T02TD1926E:26b-18: padma la sogs 'dzin pa'i phyag / rlung mtshams na ni 'gro don mdzad //
T02TD1926E:26b-19: badzra ra ti zhes pa yis //
T02TD1926E:26b-20: mdzod ldan ljang gu autpala can //
T02TD1926E:26b-21: phyi ma gtso bo'i mtshan 'dzin ma //
T02TD1926E:26b-22: dbang ldan grva ru bsam par bya //
T02TD1926E:26b-23: gti mug gshin rje lha mo bzhi //
T02TD1926E:26b-24: padma zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD1926E:26b-25: lhag ma padma nyi ma la //
T02TD1926E:26b-26: lnga phrag gnyis dang drug phyed lha //
T02TD1926E:26b-27: gri gug bandha'i phyag zung cig / mthun par rang gi rig ma 'khyud //
T02TD1926E:26b-28: bzhir gyur dbus su de 'od bsam //
T02TD1926E:26b-29: sngon po'i g-yas dkar g-yon pa dmar //
T02TD1926E:26b-30: dkar po'i g-yas sngo g-yon pa dmar //
T02TD1926E:26b-31: dmar po ser po ljang gu yi //
T02TD1926E:26b-32: g-yas sngo g-yon pa dkar po yin //
T02TD1926E:26b-33: ral ba'i thor tshugs 'od phreng can //
T02TD1926E:26b-34: ma lus 'khrugs pa sbrul gyis brgyan //
T02TD1926E:26b-35: me mtshams la sogs bhandha bzhi //
T02TD1926E:26b-36: zla bas gang ba aom gyis mtshan //
T02TD1926E:26b-38: de nyid gsum gyis rim bzhin gdon //
T02TD1926E:26b-40: dkyil 'khor lha rnams thams cad kyi //
T02TD1926E:26b-41: mig dang rna ba sna dang lce //
T02TD1926E:26b-42: lus yid skra mtshams brang rtse ru //
T02TD1926E:26b-43: kshim dzi kham gam kam sam las //
T02TD1926E:26b-44: gti mug gshin dgra sogs rim bzhin //
T02TD1926E:26b-45: rdo rje can sogs kha dog rgya //
T02TD1926E:26b-46: mngon par shes pa'i don du ni //
T02TD1926E:26b-47: rdo rje skye mched rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1926E:26b-48: snying mgrin dpral ba'i zla stengs su //
T02TD1926E:26b-50: h'um a'a: aom yig bkod byas te //
T02TD1926E:26b-51: de las phyag rgya de byung sku //
T02TD1926E:26b-52: zhe sdang 'dod chags gti mug dang //
T02TD1926E:26b-53: 'dra bar thugs sogs bsgom byas te //
T02TD1926E:26b-54: de dag thams cad rang rang rgya //
T02TD1926E:26b-55: mtshan ma'i lte bar h'um a'a: aom //
T02TD1926E:26b-56: de las tsa rtsi k'a sogs spro //
T02TD1926E:26b-57: mkhar bkug sangs rgyas mnyes byas nas //
T02TD1926E:27a-2: byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags 'di brjod //
T02TD1926E:27a-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta tsitta badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1926E:27a-4: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta w'a ka badzra sva bha wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1926E:27a-5: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta k'a ya badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1926E:27a-6: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka yi //
T02TD1926E:27a-7: sa bon las 'od lha mor spro //
T02TD1926E:27a-8: phyogs bcu'i mgon po mchod byas nas //
T02TD1926E:27a-9: dbang bskur ba yang blang bar bya //
T02TD1926E:27a-10: de nas de bzhin gshegs dag las //
T02TD1926E:27a-11: sprul pa'i tsa rtsi ka la sogs //
T02TD1926E:27a-12: phyag na ye shes chus gang ba'i //
T02TD1926E:27a-13: bum pa zla 'od legs thogs te //
T02TD1926E:27a-14: yid 'ong bkra shis glu len cing //
T02TD1926E:27a-15: sil snyan spos kyi sprin dag dang //
T02TD1926E:27a-16: dri med dbang bskur sprin phab pas //
T02TD1926E:27a-17: so so'i gtso bos dbu brgyan no //
T02TD1926E:27a-18: rang snying 'od kyi tsa rtsi k'a //
T02TD1926E:27a-19: bskul nas de yi thugs ka nas //
T02TD1926E:27a-20: rang 'dra 'phros te khro mo bkug / rdo rje'i gur stengs bzhugs bsams la //
T02TD1926E:27a-21: khro bo rnams kyis mngon bskrad de //
T02TD1926E:27a-22: rdo rje'i ra ba bshig byas nas //
T02TD1926E:27a-23: zhugs te rang mdun padmar bsam //
T02TD1926E:27a-24: de nas snying 'phros khro bo yis //
T02TD1926E:27a-25: phur bshig phyir brtsigs snying zhugs bsam //
T02TD1926E:27a-26: rang mdun dung chos sogs gsum bzhag / me tog dkar ldan dri chus bkang //
T02TD1926E:27a-27: de mdun man 'ji gnyis stengs su //
T02TD1926E:27a-28: gser sogs gsol ba'i snod gnyis bzhag / g-yas phyogs dung ni gsum pa la //
T02TD1926E:27a-30: byin brlabs bdud rtsi bcu byed blugs //
T02TD1926E:27a-31: hr'i: shtri: wi kri'i sngags bzlas la //
T02TD1926E:27a-32: ku sha'i bam pos dang po'i chu //
T02TD1926E:27a-33: bzed zhal dang por lan gsum gtor //
T02TD1926E:27a-34: gnyis pa chu dang me tog bcas //
T02TD1926E:27a-35: gzung ste de yi snod nyid la //
T02TD1926E:27a-36: phyogs su dung ni gsum pa la //
T02TD1926E:27a-37: lan gsum nye reg sbyin par bya //
T02TD1926E:27a-38: gsum pa bdud rtsi dang ldan pas //
T02TD1926E:27a-39: gnyis par mchod yon chu yang sbyin //
T02TD1926E:27a-40: de nas me tog gzung byas la //
T02TD1926E:27a-41: zhabs bsil phyag rgya dang ldan pas //
T02TD1926E:27a-42: de yi snod la zhabs bsil sbyin //
T02TD1926E:27a-43: rang snying 'od kyis tho ba bskul //
T02TD1926E:27a-44: mung+gar dza: zhes brjod nas dgug / de bzhin be con bskul ba yis //
T02TD1926E:27a-45: danda h'um zhes brjod nas gzhug / snying pos padma bskul nas su //
T02TD1926E:27a-46: padma bam zhes brjod nas bcing //
T02TD1926E:27a-47: de bzhin ral gri 'dzin bskul te //
T02TD1926E:27a-48: khadga ho: zhes brjod mnyes bya //
T02TD1926E:27a-49: rang snying ye shes 'od zer gyis //
T02TD1926E:27b-0: mkha' khyab sangs @27b rgyas kun bkug nas //
T02TD1926E:27b-1: khar thim lus kyi bcud gyur te //
T02TD1926E:27b-2: rdo rje lam byung shes rab kyi //
T02TD1926E:27b-4: lha mo'i tshogs ni mdzes gyur te //
T02TD1926E:27b-5: ba spu'i bu ga las 'phros nas //
T02TD1926E:27b-6: me tog sna tshogs mdzes rnams kyi //
T02TD1926E:27b-7: sdong bu lag bas legs bzung nas //
T02TD1926E:27b-8: sgeg dang bcas pas mchod byas te //
T02TD1926E:27b-9: rab snyan yid 'phrog glu dang ni //
T02TD1926E:27b-10: sna tshogs mdzes pa'i gar gyis su //
T02TD1926E:27b-11: bde ba chen po rab tu ster //
T02TD1926E:27b-12: kye kye gshin rje dgra nag po //
T02TD1926E:27b-13: bla ma srin po'i gzugs rang bzhin //
T02TD1926E:27b-14: bdag gis khyod mthong rnam par 'jigs //
T02TD1926E:27b-15: khro bo'i rang bzhin nyid spongs te //
T02TD1926E:27b-16: bdag po yis ni gar byas pas //
T02TD1926E:27b-18: nag po khro bo yid kyis 'jigs //
T02TD1926E:27b-19: gar byed khyod ni 'jigs pa che //
T02TD1926E:27b-20: nag po mi'u thung gshin dgra nag / gzugs ni rnam pa sna tshogs sprul //
T02TD1926E:27b-21: rdo rje dbyangs can mas zhus pa //
T02TD1926E:27b-22: gar byed khyod ni bde ba che //
T02TD1926E:27b-23: hr'i: shtri:'i sngags kyis gar byed khyod //
T02TD1926E:27b-24: gnas gsum kun gyi the tshom spongs //
T02TD1926E:27b-25: rje btsun gshin rje khro bo khyod //
T02TD1926E:27b-26: 'gro ba kun gyis gar byed mthong //
T02TD1926E:27b-27: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza badzra sva bh'a wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02TD1926E:27b-28: sgra yul thams cad brag ca dang //
T02TD1926E:27b-29: 'dra bar rab tu blta byas te //
T02TD1926E:27b-30: rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar gnas la //
T02TD1926E:27b-31: yon tan kun ni sgrogs par bsam //
T02TD1926E:27b-32: gti mug rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02TD1926E:27b-33: gshin dgra nag po rab tu 'jigs //
T02TD1926E:27b-34: ston pa sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag / mi 'jigs sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1926E:27b-35: ser sna rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02TD1926E:27b-36: gshin dgra nag po shin tu 'jigs //
T02TD1926E:27b-37: thugs kyi rdo rje rab snang ba //
T02TD1926E:27b-38: rin chen rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1926E:27b-39: 'dod chags rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02TD1926E:27b-41: dbyangs kun gyi ni mchog gi mchog / gsung gi rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1926E:27b-42: phrag dog rdo rje'i rang bzhin khyod //
T02TD1926E:27b-43: thams cad las kun gshin rje'i dgra //
T02TD1926E:27b-44: las kyi rdo rje rab snang ba //
T02TD1926E:27b-45: ral gri'i phyag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1926E:27b-46: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod //
T02TD1926E:27b-47: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa //
T02TD1926E:27b-48: sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog gi mchog / dkyil 'khor bdag la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1926E:27b-49: yam las byung ba sngon po la //
T02TD1926E:27b-50: gzhu 'dra'i ba dan mtshan pa ste //
T02TD1926E:28a-2: g-yo med steng na me nyid ni //
T02TD1926E:28a-3: dmar po gru gsum ram las byung //
T02TD1926E:28a-4: de steng aa las ba dan ni //
T02TD1926E:28a-5: mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa'o //
T02TD1926E:28a-6: de nang bdud rtsi rnam lnga ni //
T02TD1926E:28a-7: gshin rje lnga yi yi ge las //
T02TD1926E:28a-8: lcags kyu lnga ni de nyid kyi //
T02TD1926E:28a-9: ming gi thog ma'i yi ge las //
T02TD1926E:28a-10: h'um dkar las byung rdo rje yis //
T02TD1926E:28a-11: de la kha ni bkab par bsam //
T02TD1926E:28a-12: mtho gang spags pa'i bar snang la //
T02TD1926E:28a-13: zla ba'i steng du aom dkar bsam //
T02TD1926E:28a-14: kha bkab rdo rje'i lte ba yis //
T02TD1926E:28a-16: de yis rlung bskyod des me bskul //
T02TD1926E:28a-17: rdzas kun zhu zhing khol ba la //
T02TD1926E:28a-18: rdo rjes 'khrug cing zhu gyur pas //
T02TD1926E:28a-19: shin tu dri med bdag mthong nas //
T02TD1926E:28a-20: aom las 'od byung ye shes kyi //
T02TD1926E:28a-21: bdud rtsi bsdus nas der thim pas //
T02TD1926E:28a-22: gangs chu 'dra bar bsil gyur te //
T02TD1926E:28a-23: yi ge gsum brjod bsrungs la bzhag / gshin rje gshed kyi lha rnams kyi //
T02TD1926E:28a-24: ljags la rdo rje dkar po re //
T02TD1926E:28a-25: bsams te de las 'od zer ni //
T02TD1926E:28a-26: sbu gur gyur pa rab 'phros te //
T02TD1926E:28a-27: bdud rtsir zug la rang rang sngags //
T02TD1926E:28a-28: brjod pas sbu gus btung nas tshim //
T02TD1926E:28a-30: dngos kun gshin rje dgrar byas nas //
T02TD1926E:28a-31: bsdus te bdag la thim gyur bas //
T02TD1926E:28a-32: bdag nyid yar thim thig ler gyur //
T02TD1926E:28a-33: thig ler 'khor lo rdzogs par bskyed //
T02TD1926E:28a-34: de yi 'od kyi phreng ba yis //
T02TD1926E:28a-35: bdag sogs lha rnams bsal byas te //
T02TD1926E:28a-36: snying gar dkyil 'khor phra gnas pas //
T02TD1926E:28a-37: brtan par gyur nas spro dang bsdu //
T02TD1926E:28a-38: las dang chos dang chen po dang //
T02TD1926E:28a-39: gsang gsum dam tshig phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1926E:28a-40: thugs gsung sku yi rdo rje la //
T02TD1926E:28a-41: rang rang sa bon thugs kar bsam //
T02TD1926E:28a-42: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka ru //
T02TD1926E:28a-43: hr'i: shtri: la sogs gsang sngags bsam //
T02TD1926E:28a-44: gsang sngags bzlas pas gnas bzhi nas //
T02TD1926E:28a-45: khro bo'i rgyun rnams spro bsdu ba //
T02TD1926E:28a-46: rim pa'am lhan cig bya bar 'dod //
T02TD1926E:28a-47: dbugs dbyung 'phro bar bsam bya ste //
T02TD1926E:28a-48: dbugs bsdu sngags kyang bsdu bar bya //
T02TD1926E:28a-49: bgrang phreng dung chen la sogs la //
T02TD1926E:28a-50: bdud rtsi lnga sogs mchod byas nas /
T02TD1926E:28a-51: gshin rje dgra yi skur bsams te //
T02TD1926E:28a-52: mthe bo lcags kyus drang zhing bzlas //
T02TD1926E:28a-53: rang snying de bzhin dmigs nyid pas //
T02TD1926E:28a-54: sems la nyams su chung 'gyur zhing //
T02TD1926E:28a-55: bzlas pas skyon lag g-yas kyis //
T02TD1926E:28b-0: bsgrims te rdo rje gsor @28b nas kyang //
T02TD1926E:28b-1: g-yon pas rdo rje dril gsil zhing //
T02TD1926E:28b-2: rdo rje glu tshul sna tshogs dang //
T02TD1926E:28b-3: mchod pa sna tshogs rnams kyis mchod //
T02TD1926E:28b-4: dkyil 'khor bzhengs la yang bzlas so //
T02TD1926E:28b-5: bdag nyid gtong bar 'dod gyur na //
T02TD1926E:28b-7: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang byas la //
T02TD1926E:28b-8: yig gsum mtha' ru mu: bzhag pa'i //
T02TD1926E:28b-9: sngags kyis ye shes gshegs par bskul //
T02TD1926E:28b-10: ting nge 'dzin gyi lha rnams ni //
T02TD1926E:28b-11: aom a'a: h'um mu: bdag la bsdu //
T02TD1926E:28b-12: bdag nyid ye shes sems dpa' la //
T02TD1926E:28b-13: ye shes sems dpa' phyag rgya ste //
T02TD1926E:28b-14: de yang yi ge de stong bsam //
T02TD1926E:28b-15: bzod pa gsol dang gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1926E:28b-16: bsngo dang smon lam gdab par bya //
T02TD1926E:28b-19: // / rang gi lha yi nga rgyal gyis //
T02TD1926E:28b-20: yang dag langs la spyod lam kun //
T02TD1926E:28b-21: gshin rje dgra yi ngo bor byas //
T02TD1926E:28b-22: zab cing rgya che'i rang bzhin no //
T02TD1926E:28b-23: kha zas ci za bdud rtsir brlab //
T02TD1926E:28b-24: kha yi hom khung sreg khang du //
T02TD1926E:28b-25: lha rnams tshim bya sreg rdzas rnams //
T02TD1926E:28b-26: lag pa'i gzar bus bstab par bya //
T02TD1926E:28b-27: phyi yi khrus rnams byad pa ni //
T02TD1926E:28b-28: 'gro ba rang bzhin dag bsams la //
T02TD1926E:28b-29: dbang bskur ba yi cho ga bzhin //
T02TD1926E:28b-30: lha mo'i bum chus bkrus par bsam //
T02TD1926E:28b-31: phyi thun la yang de bzhin du //
T02TD1926E:28b-32: dkyil 'khor bsdu ba'i bar du bya //
T02TD1926E:28b-33: bza' ba zos nas nyal ba'i tshe //
T02TD1926E:28b-34: shes rab snying rjer ldan pas nyal //
T02TD1926E:28b-35: ldang ba'i dus na dpal ldan pa'i //
T02TD1926E:28b-36: lha ma'i dbyangs kyis bskul bar bsam //
T02TD1926E:28b-38: rnal 'byor pa yi bya ba yin //
T02TD1926E:28b-40: sbyor ba rnam gsum rim bzhin bya //
T02TD1926E:28b-41: spyod lam dag gi tshe na yang //
T02TD1926E:28b-42: lus ngag yid kyi bya ba kun //
T02TD1926E:28b-43: phyag rgya sngags kyi bdag nyid du //
T02TD1926E:28b-44: bsams te bya ba kun bya'o //
T02TD1926E:28b-45: dpa' mig cig cig mthong ba la //
T02TD1926E:28b-46: bde sdug rnam par grol 'gyur ba //
T02TD1926E:28b-47: sems nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir //
T02TD1926E:28b-48: rtog med sems gnag ga la 'gyur //
T02TD1926E:28b-49: sngon du bsnyen pa bya ba'i cho ga'o /
T02TD1926E:28b-52: // / bsnyen pas bgegs kyi tshogs bcom la //
T02TD1926E:28b-53: gzhan gyi don la brtson bya ba'ang //
T02TD1926E:28b-54: mtshan ma brtan po yang dang yang //
T02TD1926E:28b-55: mthong zhing gnang ba thob nas bya //
T02TD1926E:28b-56: yid dga' ba yi sa phyogs ni //
T02TD1926E:28b-57: shar dang byang gi cha nyid do //
T02TD1926E:28b-58: dbus mtho shar dang byang gzhol bar //
T02TD1926E:28b-59: bgegs bskrad phur btab gtor ma sbyin //
T02TD1926E:29a-0: @29a * // gsol btab rnal 'byor gsum byas nas //
T02TD1926E:29a-1: sangs rgyas la yang gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1926E:29a-2: mchod yon zhabs bsil phul nas su //
T02TD1926E:29a-3: sbyin sreg gis kyang rab tshim bya //
T02TD1926E:29a-4: de nas mkha' la bkod nas su //
T02TD1926E:29a-5: bgegs med sa ni legs brkos nas //
T02TD1926E:29a-6: slar yang sa yis rab tu dgong //
T02TD1926E:29a-7: sngon du dus ring bsnyen byas pa'i //
T02TD1926E:29a-8: gshin rje gshed kyi sbyor ldan pas //
T02TD1926E:29a-9: dkyil 'khor sa ni rdzogs byas te //
T02TD1926E:29a-10: aom bhu kham zhes sngags kyis ni //
T02TD1926E:29a-11: mkha' la ri ni bskyed par bya //
T02TD1926E:29a-12: h'um lam h'um zhes rdo rje'i bdag / nyid du sa byas de byin brlab //
T02TD1926E:29a-13: aom me di n'i badzr'i bha ba badzra bandha h'um /
T02TD1926E:29a-14: sngon bzhin lha yi ting nge 'dzin ni //
T02TD1926E:29a-15: sa yi dbus su rnal 'byor bzhi //
T02TD1926E:29a-16: rim bzhin byas nas rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD1926E:29a-17: sangs rgyas kun bdag gshin rje ni //
T02TD1926E:29a-18: rdo rje dril 'dzin gtso bo la //
T02TD1926E:29a-19: grogs po rdo rje dril 'dzin bzhi //
T02TD1926E:29a-20: gti mug sogs bdag lhan cig tu //
T02TD1926E:29a-21: sprul pas dkyil 'khor gsum la ni //
T02TD1926E:29a-22: mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02TD1926E:29a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa kun zhi ba //
T02TD1926E:29a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas //
T02TD1926E:29a-25: chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1926E:29a-26: mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs //
T02TD1926E:29a-27: mtshan min thams cad yang dag spangs //
T02TD1926E:29a-28: kun du bzang po sku yi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1926E:29a-29: zhi ba'i chos mchog yang dag byung //
T02TD1926E:29a-30: ye shes spyod pa rnam sbyong ba //
T02TD1926E:29a-31: kun du bzang po gsung gi mchog / dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad du gsol //
T02TD1926E:29a-32: sems can kun gyi sems chen po //
T02TD1926E:29a-33: rang bzhin dag pas dri ma med //
T02TD1926E:29a-34: kun bzang thugs mchog kha lo sgyur //
T02TD1926E:29a-35: dkyil 'khor dam pa bzhad du gsol //
T02TD1926E:29a-36: de nas gshin rje gshed langs te //
T02TD1926E:29a-37: ma dang ta yi yi ge las //
T02TD1926E:29a-38: g-yas dang g-yon gyi mig gnyis su //
T02TD1926E:29a-39: nyi ma dang ni zla ba bsam //
T02TD1926E:29a-40: blo can 'gro ba kun bltas nas //
T02TD1926E:29a-41: dkyil 'khor sa la stang stabs bskor //
T02TD1926E:29a-42: rkang mthil aa las rdo rjer bsgom //
T02TD1926E:29a-43: g-yas pas rdo rje gsor byed cing //
T02TD1926E:29a-44: g-yon pas dril gsil 'gying bag tu //
T02TD1926E:29a-45: gnas te mche gtsigs h'um brjod do //
T02TD1926E:29a-46: lha dang lha min la sogs pa //
T02TD1926E:29a-47: gdug pa'i tshogs rnams bskrad par bya //
T02TD1926E:29b-0: nyon cig bgegs kyi tshogs rnams @29b kun //
T02TD1926E:29b-1: sku gsung thugs la gnas pa yi //
T02TD1926E:29b-2: bdag ni dpal ldan ral gri 'dzin //
T02TD1926E:29b-3: srung ba'i 'khor lo'i don byed pa //
T02TD1926E:29b-5: gal te gang gis bdag tshig 'das //
T02TD1926E:29b-6: lus ngag gsum las skyes pa bcad //
T02TD1926E:29b-8: de nas sa la bskor byas te //
T02TD1926E:29b-9: mgegs [*'gegs?] med bya phyir phur bus gdab //
T02TD1926E:29b-10: phur ba stod ni khro bo la //
T02TD1926E:29b-11: smad ni rdo rje rtse gcig pa //
T02TD1926E:29b-12: phur ba'i gsang sngags bzlas pa lnga //
T02TD1926E:29b-13: mtshams dang dbus su gdab par bya //
T02TD1926E:29b-15: phyogs bcur yang dag gnas pa yi //
T02TD1926E:29b-16: bgegs kyi phung po kun gzhom mo //
T02TD1926E:29b-17: shin tu bgegs med rab mthong nas //
T02TD1926E:29b-18: mtshams bcas phyogs bcing sngon bzhin du //
T02TD1926E:29b-19: blo yis byas nas sa rdzogs nas //
T02TD1926E:29b-20: sta gon gnas pa'i rim bzhin bya //
T02TD1926E:29b-21: bam ser las byung lha mo ni //
T02TD1926E:29b-22: 'od dang bcas pa bkug nas su //
T02TD1926E:29b-23: mchod pa phul nas gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1926E:29b-24: skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1926E:29b-25: spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyi //
T02TD1926E:29b-26: sa dang pha rol phyin pa la //
T02TD1926E:29b-27: lha mo khyod ni dpang btsugs te //
T02TD1926E:29b-28: sh'akya seng ge skyob pa yis //
T02TD1926E:29b-29: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //
T02TD1926E:29b-30: de ltar bdag gis bdud sde las //
T02TD1926E:29b-31: rgyal bar byas te dkyil 'khor bri //
T02TD1926E:29b-32: dri zhim chu yis sa byugs nas //
T02TD1926E:29b-33: me tog mdzes pa sna tshogs dgram //
T02TD1926E:29b-34: bdud rtsi dang ldan dri chu yis //
T02TD1926E:29b-35: lha rnams mandala rab tu bya //
T02TD1926E:29b-36: de la dkyil 'khor rang sngags kyis //
T02TD1926E:29b-37: bkug la mtshams sogs bcing byas nas //
T02TD1926E:29b-38: mchod bstod bdud rtsi myang bar bya //
T02TD1926E:29b-39: de nas bum pa'i sta gon ni //
T02TD1926E:29b-40: rin chen bum pa mi gnag pa //
T02TD1926E:29b-41: mgrin pa ras kyis bcings pa las //
T02TD1926E:29b-42: ldum bu mchog gis kha la brgyan //
T02TD1926E:29b-43: rin chen sman 'bru sna lnga dang //
T02TD1926E:29b-44: dri chus bkang ba mngon par bsngags //
T02TD1926E:29b-45: sna tshogs me tog brgyus pa yi //
T02TD1926E:29b-46: skud pa'i rtse mor rdo rje gdags //
T02TD1926E:29b-47: bum khar bzhag la lag pas bzung //
T02TD1926E:29b-48: rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gtso la sogs //
T02TD1926E:29b-49: sngags bzlas nas ni mchod yod 'bul //
T02TD1926E:29b-50: me tog dbul dang spos sogs mchod //
T02TD1926E:29b-51: dri sogs padma'i snod legs gzhag / nyin dang tshan mo thun gsum du //
T02TD1926E:29b-52: gtor ma sbyin zhing de bzhin bzla //
T02TD1926E:29b-53: de dag dkyil 'khor phyi rol la //
T02TD1926E:30a-2: de nas g-yon gyi snod la chu //
T02TD1926E:30a-3: blugs nas de yis gtor bas na //
T02TD1926E:30a-4: bdag dang slob ma thams cad kyi //
T02TD1926E:30a-5: chu yis dbang bskur gyur ba yin //
T02TD1926E:30a-6: de nas rang gi lce brlabs la //
T02TD1926E:30a-7: g-yas pas spor phor bteg nas su //
T02TD1926E:30a-8: pus mo btsugs nas blo ldan pas /
T02TD1926E:30a-9: dkyil 'khor gtso dang sangs rgyas zhu //
T02TD1926E:30a-10: mgon po zhe sdang gshin rje yi //
T02TD1926E:30a-11: rig pa'i rgyal po phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02TD1926E:30a-12: bdag gis gshin rje'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1926E:30a-13: mgon po bri bar 'dod pa ste //
T02TD1926E:30a-14: slob ma rnams la phan phyir dang //
T02TD1926E:30a-15: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02TD1926E:30a-16: de bas bcom ldan gus ldan la //
T02TD1926E:30a-17: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad par gsol //
T02TD1926E:30a-18: sangs rgyas rnams ni bdag la dgongs //
T02TD1926E:30a-20: 'bras gnas byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD1926E:30a-21: gsang sngags kyi ni lha gzhan dang //
T02TD1926E:30a-22: 'jig rten skyong ba'i lha rnams dang //
T02TD1926E:30a-23: 'byung po yang dag rdzogs pa yi //
T02TD1926E:30a-24: sangs rgyas bstan par mngon dga' dang //
T02TD1926E:30a-25: gang su lha yi mig can rnams //
T02TD1926E:30a-26: che ge zhes pa'i rdo rje yis //
T02TD1926E:30a-28: ji ltar nye bar spyod nus pas //
T02TD1926E:30a-29: 'gro dag don du bri bar bya //
T02TD1926E:30a-30: slob ma dang bcas pa dag la ni //
T02TD1926E:30a-31: thugs rjes nye bar bzung nas su //
T02TD1926E:30a-32: thams cad dkyil 'khor la bcug nas //
T02TD1926E:30a-33: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
T02TD1926E:30a-34: de ltar snyan gsan lan gsum du //
T02TD1926E:30a-35: byas nas gtso la yon chab sogs //
T02TD1926E:30a-36: phul nas bsrungs te phyir byung nas //
T02TD1926E:30a-37: slob ma brtags pa gzung bar bya /
T02TD1926E:30a-38: byas pa gzo dang khengs pa med /
T02TD1926E:30a-39: rigs mdog na sor ldan pa dang //
T02TD1926E:30a-40: theg pa mchog la mngon dga' ba'o //
T02TD1926E:30a-41: de las bzlog pa'i slob ma ni //
T02TD1926E:30a-42: dman pas sta gon gnas mi bya //
T02TD1926E:30a-44: phyi ma'i tshe la mi 'byung ngo //
T02TD1926E:30a-45: skyes bu tshe phyi mar 'dod pas //
T02TD1926E:30a-47: de ltar slob ma la smras nas //
T02TD1926E:30a-48: blo ldan rang gis nang du 'gro //
T02TD1926E:30a-49: yon tan de ldan slob ma yis //
T02TD1926E:30a-50: sgo nas gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02TD1926E:30a-51: dga' chen khyod bdag ston pa bas //
T02TD1926E:30a-52: slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol //
T02TD1926E:30a-53: byang chub chen po'i tshul brtan pa //
T02TD1926E:30a-54: mgon po chen po bdag la stsol //
T02TD1926E:30a-55: de nyid dam tshig bdag la stsol //
T02TD1926E:30a-56: byang chub sems kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD1926E:30b-0: @30b sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te //
T02TD1926E:30b-1: skyabs gsum dag kyang bdag la stsol //
T02TD1926E:30b-2: thar pa chen po'i grong khyer du //
T02TD1926E:30b-3: mgon po bdag ni 'jug par bgyid //
T02TD1926E:30b-4: de star lan gsum brjod nus pa'i //
T02TD1926E:30b-5: slob ma rab chags mdzes pa la //
T02TD1926E:30b-6: slob dpon rtse gcig tu byas la //
T02TD1926E:30b-7: tshig 'dis gnang ba sbyin par bya //
T02TD1926E:30b-9: cho ga sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul //
T02TD1926E:30b-10: khyod la yang dag bstan par bya //
T02TD1926E:30b-11: tshul chen la khyod bsnyen pa gyis //
T02TD1926E:30b-12: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang 'das dang //
T02TD1926E:30b-13: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
T02TD1926E:30b-14: da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams //
T02TD1926E:30b-15: 'gro la phan phyir zhugs pa kun //
T02TD1926E:30b-16: de dag gis ni gsang sngags kyi //
T02TD1926E:30b-17: cho ga mchog bzang 'di brnyes nas //
T02TD1926E:30b-18: dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du //
T02TD1926E:30b-19: thams cad mkhyen pa mnyam med brnyes //
T02TD1926E:30b-20: gsang sngags cho ga mnyam med de //
T02TD1926E:30b-21: sh'akya seng ge la sogs kyis //
T02TD1926E:30b-22: bdud sde shin tu mi bzad pa'i //
T02TD1926E:30b-23: dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom //
T02TD1926E:30b-26: de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir //
T02TD1926E:30b-27: bu yis blo gros 'di gyes shig / de nas bshags dang yi rang sogs //
T02TD1926E:30b-28: byas nas byang chub sems bskyed la //
T02TD1926E:30b-29: srung ba byas te de nas ni //
T02TD1926E:30b-30: thugs gsung sku yi byin brlabs la //
T02TD1926E:30b-31: yi ge gsum dang ldan pa der //
T02TD1926E:30b-32: mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya //
T02TD1926E:30b-33: de nas lha yi sngags bzlas pa'i //
T02TD1926E:30b-34: so shing sor ni bcu gnyis pa //
T02TD1926E:30b-35: me tog rtser ldan sbyin par bya //
T02TD1926E:30b-36: tho rangs langs nas shar bltas te //
T02TD1926E:30b-37: sa lam lhung lci ba yis //
T02TD1926E:30b-38: sal ba ko tsam byugs te //
T02TD1926E:30b-39: rtse mo bca' zhing de ru dor //
T02TD1926E:30b-40: zhing dang rgyas sogs gar grub blta //
T02TD1926E:30b-41: de nas kha bshal hub gsum chu //
T02TD1926E:30b-42: byin la sngags 'di bzlas par bya //
T02TD1926E:30b-43: aom hr'i: bishuddha dharma: sarba p'a pam ni tsa sya sho dha ya sarba bi ka la pam aa pa na ya h'um /
T02TD1926E:30b-44: gshin rje'i sngags bzlas ku sha ni //
T02TD1926E:30b-45: stan dang sngas su sbyin par bya //
T02TD1926E:30b-46: mdud pa gsum ldan srung skud ni //
T02TD1926E:30b-47: dpung pa g-yon par bcing bar bya //
T02TD1926E:30b-48: de nas sems kyi sbungs bskyed phyir //
T02TD1926E:30b-49: zab cing rgya che'i chos bshad de //
T02TD1926E:30b-50: theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i //
T02TD1926E:30b-51: lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan //
T02TD1926E:30b-52: de phyir khyod rnams dong bas na //
T02TD1926E:31a-2: yod dang med las rnam 'das shing //
T02TD1926E:31a-3: zab mo rtog ge thams cad kyis //
T02TD1926E:31a-4: rab tu mi rtogs gnas med pa //
T02TD1926E:31a-5: spros pa kun dang bral ba ste //
T02TD1926E:31a-6: spros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
T02TD1926E:31a-7: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02TD1926E:31a-8: las dang bya ba sogs dang bral //
T02TD1926E:31a-9: bden pa gnyis la gnas pa yi //
T02TD1926E:31a-10: theg pa rab kyi mchog 'di yi //
T02TD1926E:31a-11: tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1926E:31a-12: ku sha'i mal du nyal bcug la //
T02TD1926E:31a-13: rmi lam mthong ba dge mi dge //
T02TD1926E:31a-14: tho rang sa bdag la ma 'dzem par //
T02TD1926E:31a-15: smros shig ces ni bsgos la btang //
T02TD1926E:31a-16: de nas sdom pa bzung nas su //
T02TD1926E:31a-17: dkyil 'khor sbyor ba bsgom byas te //
T02TD1926E:31a-18: mchod cing gsol ba btab byas la //
T02TD1926E:31a-19: nam mkha' la ni dgod par bya //
T02TD1926E:31a-20: kha dog lnga yi skud pa la //
T02TD1926E:31a-22: gshin rje dgra lnga'i sku ru bsam //
T02TD1926E:31a-23: zhe sdang gshin rjer bdag bltas la //
T02TD1926E:31a-24: dza las byung ba'i nyi zla'i mig //
T02TD1926E:31a-25: 'bar mig lcags kyus drangs nas su //
T02TD1926E:31a-26: rang mdog skud pa'i nang du thim //
T02TD1926E:31a-27: gti mug ral gri dang lhan cig / thig sna drangs la bsgril bar bya //
T02TD1926E:31a-28: aa n+yo n+y'a nu ga ta sarba dharm'a: pa ra sba ra aa nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a tyanta aa nu pra bishta sarba dharm'a: mtha' ma dkar ldan lag pa yis //
T02TD1926E:31a-29: gzung la sngags 'di bzlas par bya //
T02TD1926E:31a-30: sama ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02TD1926E:31a-32: sbom phra sgo yi nyi shu cha //
T02TD1926E:31a-33: dri zhim bdud rtsi lnga yis ni //
T02TD1926E:31a-34: byugs nas bsrungs la snod gtsang bzhag / de la mchod pa rnams kyis mchod //
T02TD1926E:31a-35: de nas skud pa bsngags byas la //
T02TD1926E:31a-36: dzdza yig gsum gyis gtang bar bya //
T02TD1926E:31a-37: des kyang dzdza yig gsum gyis drangs //
T02TD1926E:31a-38: lte bar khu tshur g-yon gyis bzung //
T02TD1926E:31a-39: nub tu gnas nas shar bltas te //
T02TD1926E:31a-40: mkhas pas nam mkhar thig gdab bo //
T02TD1926E:31a-41: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tra m'a ti kra ma h'um /
T02TD1926E:31a-42: sems can don byed dus dag tu //
T02TD1926E:31a-43: mkha' khyab pa yi de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1926E:31a-44: 'dir gshegs pa yi don gyi phyir //
T02TD1926E:31a-45: thig skud sgra yis bskul bar bsam //
T02TD1926E:31a-46: lho nas byang du kha bltas te //
T02TD1926E:31a-47: shar gyi thig ni rab tu gdab //
T02TD1926E:31a-48: de bzhin byang nas lhor bltas te //
T02TD1926E:31a-49: nub kyi phyogs kyi skud pa brtag / de nas shar du drangs pa yis //
T02TD1926E:31a-50: byang phyogs kyi ni ngos gdab po //
T02TD1926E:31a-51: shar nas bden bral mtshams bltas te //
T02TD1926E:31a-52: lho yi thig ni gdab par bya //
T02TD1926E:31a-53: de nas me yi mtshams gnas te //
T02TD1926E:31b-0: rlung gi mtshams su @31b gdab par bya //
T02TD1926E:31b-1: bden bral mtshams nas dbang ldan du //
T02TD1926E:31b-2: drangs te grva yi thig gdab bo //
T02TD1926E:31b-3: de nas thig rnams ci rigs par //
T02TD1926E:31b-4: lhag chad med pa nyid du gdab //
T02TD1926E:31b-5: de nas dbus su phur btab ste //
T02TD1926E:31b-6: de la brtod pa'i srad bu ni //
T02TD1926E:31b-8: rdo rje ra ba la sogs bskor //
T02TD1926E:31b-10: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1926E:31b-11: rta babs bzhi yis rab tu mdzes //
T02TD1926E:31b-12: kha khyer bzhi dang ldan pa la //
T02TD1926E:31b-13: rdo rje dril bu la sogs brgyan //
T02TD1926E:31b-14: sgo yi mtshams dang grva bzhi ru //
T02TD1926E:31b-15: zla phyed rdo rje mdzes par bya //
T02TD1926E:31b-16: de yi nang gi 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1926E:31b-17: sna tshogs rdo rje 'jigs pa ste //
T02TD1926E:31b-18: rdo rje phreng bas rab mdzes pas //
T02TD1926E:31b-19: kun nas yongs su bskor bar bya //
T02TD1926E:31b-20: h'i las nyi ma zla ba dag / mig tu bsams te khro bo yis //
T02TD1926E:31b-21: blta bar bcas pas kun bltas nas //
T02TD1926E:31b-22: sgo rnams dag ni legs bya ba //
T02TD1926E:31b-23: sgo ni 'khor lo'i brgyad char bya //
T02TD1926E:31b-24: sgo khyud chen po spangs pa yin //
T02TD1926E:31b-25: sgo yi tshad du khyams bya ste //
T02TD1926E:31b-26: de bzhin lha yi snam bu'o //
T02TD1926E:31b-27: kha khyer sgo yi phyed du ste //
T02TD1926E:31b-28: 'gram dang gshog pa de yi tshad //
T02TD1926E:31b-29: dra ba dra phyed nyi zla dang //
T02TD1926E:31b-30: rnga dang rdung dkrol la sog sa rgyan //
T02TD1926E:31b-31: de phyed tshon sna lnga yis //
T02TD1926E:31b-32: rdo rjer ba'ang de yi tshad //
T02TD1926E:31b-33: rta babs sgo yi sum 'gyur la //
T02TD1926E:31b-34: ba dan dril bu la sogs rgyan //
T02TD1926E:31b-35: rin chen kun dang lcags rnams dang //
T02TD1926E:31b-36: 'byung khung dag gi phye ma la //
T02TD1926E:31b-37: yi ge lnga bkod byin brlab bya //
T02TD1926E:31b-38: 'bar bar gyur dang gsang sngags bzlas //
T02TD1926E:31b-39: aom badzra tsi tra sa ma ya h'um /
T02TD1926E:31b-40: sems can khams rnams grol mdzad cing //
T02TD1926E:31b-41: de ni chos dbyings ro yin no //
T02TD1926E:31b-43: rlung la sogs pa byung gyur na //
T02TD1926E:31b-44: khro bo'i sbyor dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1926E:31b-45: rlung sogs bcing ba tshul bzhin bya //
T02TD1926E:31b-46: gshin rje gshed po rgyal kun gtso //
T02TD1926E:31b-47: dkyil 'khor kun gyi gtsor gyur pa //
T02TD1926E:31b-48: skyon kun las ni rnam grol ba //
T02TD1926E:31b-49: de yi dbus su legs gnas te //
T02TD1926E:31b-50: dbang ldan mtshams nas mnyam po ru //
T02TD1926E:31b-51: bla mas g-yon gyi khu tshur gyis //
T02TD1926E:31b-52: dkar dang ser dang de bzhin dmar //
T02TD1926E:31b-53: ljang gu sngon po de bzhin no //
T02TD1926E:31b-54: mnyam dang g-yas skor tshad ldan par //
T02TD1926E:31b-55: dkyil 'khor ri mo bri bar bya //
T02TD1926E:31b-56: mnyam po bri bar ri mo ni //
T02TD1926E:31b-57: sgo yi nyi shu cha yin te //
T02TD1926E:31b-58: de las sboms na nad 'byung la //
T02TD1926E:32a-0: phras na nor rnams zad par @32a * //
T02TD1926E:32a-3: chad na slob ma bla ma 'chi //
T02TD1926E:32a-4: g-yas skor du ni ma bris na //
T02TD1926E:32a-5: rdul tshon gyi ni dngos grub nyams //
T02TD1926E:32a-6: rdo rje rtse mo dkar po'i ngos //
T02TD1926E:32a-7: gzhan ser ba yi mdog yin te //
T02TD1926E:32a-8: gzhan ni padma r'a ga'i ngos //
T02TD1926E:32a-9: de bzhin ma ra ka ta ste //
T02TD1926E:32a-10: nang du sngon por shes par bya //
T02TD1926E:32a-11: de ni rdul tshon rim par bshad //
T02TD1926E:32a-12: shar gyi phyogs su dkar po ste //
T02TD1926E:32a-13: lho yi phyogs su ser po yin //
T02TD1926E:32a-14: nub phyogs dmar po bya ba ste //
T02TD1926E:32a-15: byang phyogs ljang gu dag tu 'dod //
T02TD1926E:32a-16: dbus ma'i sa yi cha nyid ni //
T02TD1926E:32a-18: rtag tu shes rab thabs ldan pas //
T02TD1926E:32a-19: shin tu mnyam gzhag yang dag bri //
T02TD1926E:32a-20: zla ba nyi ma'i gdan dag la //
T02TD1926E:32a-22: rdo rje dbus su yang dag bri //
T02TD1926E:32a-24: 'khor lo shar gyi ra la bri //
T02TD1926E:32a-26: rin chen lho yi phyogs su bri //
T02TD1926E:32a-28: padma dmar po sdong bur bcas //
T02TD1926E:32a-30: ral gri byang gi ra la bri //
T02TD1926E:32a-32: shar gyi sgo ru bri bar bya //
T02TD1926E:32a-34: be con lho yi sgo ru dgod //
T02TD1926E:32a-36: 'od dang ldan pa nub sgor bri //
T02TD1926E:32a-37: ral gri 'bar ba'i sprin ldan pa //
T02TD1926E:32a-38: byang gi sgo ru bri bar bya //
T02TD1926E:32a-39: me mtshams la sogs grva bzhi ru //
T02TD1926E:32a-40: go rims bzhin du 'khor lo dang //
T02TD1926E:32a-42: 'od dang ldan pa bri bar bya //
T02TD1926E:32a-43: phyi yi me mtshams la sogs par //
T02TD1926E:32a-44: zla bas gang ba'i snod bzhi bri //
T02TD1926E:32a-45: de ltar 'khor lo rdzogs pa dang //
T02TD1926E:32a-46: mkha' la bkod pa phab byas la //
T02TD1926E:32a-47: de nas sngon bzhin shes rab dang //
T02TD1926E:32a-48: sbyor byas 'khor lo bskyed nas gdon //
T02TD1926E:32a-49: de la spyan sogs byin brlab dang //
T02TD1926E:32a-50: thugs gsung sku yi rdo rje dang //
T02TD1926E:32a-51: dbang bskur la sogs bya ba yin //
T02TD1926E:32a-52: de nas sngon bzhin ye shes kyi //
T02TD1926E:32a-53: 'khor lo dgug dang bgegs bskrad sogs //
T02TD1926E:32a-54: byas la sgo bzhi'i khro bo yi //
T02TD1926E:32a-55: sngags la dza: sogs mthar ldan pas //
T02TD1926E:32a-56: dgug gzhug bcing dang dbang bya dang //
T02TD1926E:32a-57: ra ba dra ba la sogs bya //
T02TD1926E:32a-58: do nas lha mos sngon bzhin mchod //
T02TD1926E:32b-0: bstod @32b dang bdud rtsi myang ba dang //
T02TD1926E:32b-1: rdul yab sbrang yab bsil yab dang //
T02TD1926E:32b-2: khams dang skyid mos tshal dag dang //
T02TD1926E:32b-3: gzims mal dang ni gdan khri dang //
T02TD1926E:32b-4: myur 'gro rta dang glang po dang //
T02TD1926E:32b-5: yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing //
T02TD1926E:32b-6: rta bab sa dang ni bla re sogs //
T02TD1926E:32b-7: bza' btung bro mchog sna tshogs dang //
T02TD1926E:32b-8: glu gar la sogs mtha' yas mchod //
T02TD1926E:32b-9: de nas ci 'byor gzhan dag la //
T02TD1926E:32b-10: bzlas pa byas te mnyes par bya //
T02TD1926E:32b-11: bdud rtsi dang ldan dri chu yis //
T02TD1926E:32b-12: mandala legs par byas nas su //
T02TD1926E:32b-13: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1926E:32b-14: 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad aam ku sha dza: aom hr'i: shtri: wi kri t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02TD1926E:32b-15: 'byung po 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02TD1926E:32b-16: dgug dang phur bus gdab pa ste //
T02TD1926E:32b-17: de ltar byas pas 'od nyid du //
T02TD1926E:32b-18: gyur las rang rang yi ge ste //
T02TD1926E:32b-19: de las mtshan ma de las sku //
T02TD1926E:32b-20: hr'i: shtri: wi kri rnam bzhi ni //
T02TD1926E:32b-21: dbang po gshin rje chu lus ngan //
T02TD1926E:32b-22: 'byung po me lha srin po rlung //
T02TD1926E:32b-23: ta a'a na na las byung ba'o //
T02TD1926E:32b-24: h'um h'um phat dang yi ge gsum //
T02TD1926E:32b-25: nyi ma zla ba tshangs pa'o //
T02TD1926E:32b-26: phat dang sv'a ste yi ge gnyis //
T02TD1926E:32b-27: sa bdag dang ni lha ma yin //
T02TD1926E:32b-28: h'a ni khyab 'jug la sogs so //
T02TD1926E:32b-29: thams cad zhal gsum nyis 'gyur phyag / dang po rang rang phyag mtshan la //
T02TD1926E:32b-30: lhag ma bde bar gshegs dang mthun //
T02TD1926E:32b-31: zhal mdog rigs kyi gtso bo 'dra //
T02TD1926E:32b-32: mig sogs brlab dang lus ngag yid //
T02TD1926E:32b-33: dbang bskur ba yang 'dra byas nas //
T02TD1926E:32b-34: gtor ma bdud rtsi bzhin brlabs la //
T02TD1926E:32b-35: lce yang brlabs te sbubs kyis su //
T02TD1926E:32b-36: rang sngags brjod pas brngub par bya //
T02TD1926E:32b-37: aom aindr'a ya h'ri: ya ma shthi: wa ru n'a ya wi /
T02TD1926E:32b-46: ba su dha r'a ya phat /
T02TD1926E:32b-47: be ma tsi tr'a ya sv'a /
T02TD1926E:32b-51: de yis phyogs skyong tshim byas nas //
T02TD1926E:32b-53: de nas dkyil 'khor zhal bsro'i phyir //
T02TD1926E:32b-54: sbyin sreg gis ni tshim bya ste //
T02TD1926E:32b-55: sbyin sreg las las 'byung ba ltar //
T02TD1926E:32b-56: zhi dang rgyas pa bya bar 'dod //
T02TD1926E:32b-57: de nas slob ma rnams gzhug phyir //
T02TD1926E:32b-58: dang por bdag nyid 'jug par bya //
T02TD1926E:32b-59: bdag nyid sku sogs byin brlab cing //
T02TD1926E:33a-2: slob ma gzhug pa'i don du ni //
T02TD1926E:33a-3: de nyid rab tu brjod par bya //
T02TD1926E:33a-4: aom nam mkha' las byung mtshan ldan phyir //
T02TD1926E:33a-5: thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog / sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin //
T02TD1926E:33a-6: rdo rje sems dpar deng grub mdzod //
T02TD1926E:33a-7: kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste //
T02TD1926E:33a-8: dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha //
T02TD1926E:33a-9: rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal //
T02TD1926E:33a-10: mi 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD1926E:33a-11: nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod //
T02TD1926E:33a-12: 'dod chags kun gyi rjes chags pa //
T02TD1926E:33a-13: 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che //
T02TD1926E:33a-14: bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod //
T02TD1926E:33a-15: shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog / gdod nas grol bde bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1926E:33a-16: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1926E:33a-17: byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod //
T02TD1926E:33a-18: dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog //
T02TD1926E:33a-19: dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog //
T02TD1926E:33a-20: grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pa //
T02TD1926E:33a-21: rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig /
T02TD1926E:33a-22: de nas bden pa'i byin rlabs brjod //
T02TD1926E:33a-23: sems can kun gyi yid khyab cing //
T02TD1926E:33a-24: sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs //
T02TD1926E:33a-25: sems can kun gyi yab gyur nyid //
T02TD1926E:33a-26: 'dod chags dam tshig mchog gyur pa'i //
T02TD1926E:33a-27: mgon po bden pa 'di yis ni //
T02TD1926E:33a-28: bdag la khyed kyis 'dod rdzogs shog / chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02TD1926E:33a-29: dag cing gsal la rnyog pa med //
T02TD1926E:33a-30: gzung du med cing brjod du med //
T02TD1926E:33a-31: rgyu dang las las kun du byung //
T02TD1926E:33a-32: de nyid de nyid bskyed pa ni //
T02TD1926E:33a-33: de dag bden pas dkyil 'khor la //
T02TD1926E:33a-34: gzugs brnyan gsal bar slob ma ni //
T02TD1926E:33a-35: sdig med par ni thams cad mthong //
T02TD1926E:33a-36: thun mong sdom bzung slob ma ni //
T02TD1926E:33a-37: sngon bzhin sku sogs 'od gsal ba //
T02TD1926E:33a-38: yol bas bar du bcad nas su //
T02TD1926E:33a-39: kun byed bum pa'i chu yis su //
T02TD1926E:33a-40: bkrus pa'i dar ras dmar po yis //
T02TD1926E:33a-41: bu sdug de yi ngo bkab la //
T02TD1926E:33a-42: khyod su zhes ni dri bar bya //
T02TD1926E:33a-43: bdag ni skal ldan yin zhes smra //
T02TD1926E:33a-44: khyod ci dga' zhes dris pa la //
T02TD1926E:33a-45: skal ba bzang la bdag dga' zhes //
T02TD1926E:33a-46: 'jug pa pos kyang smra bar bya //
T02TD1926E:33a-47: de nas phreng ba sbyin bya ste //
T02TD1926E:33a-49: yongs 'du dag ni ma li ka //
T02TD1926E:33a-50: kar ni ka yi phreng ba ni //
T02TD1926E:33a-51: legs par mnos te bus zung shig / aom a'a: h'um /
T02TD1926E:33a-52: bla ma slob dpon mgon rjes su //
T02TD1926E:33a-53: 'bad pa chen pos dbang gi don //
T02TD1926E:33b-0: ji ltar sangs @33b rgyas chos chen pos //
T02TD1926E:33b-1: rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ltar //
T02TD1926E:33b-2: de bzhin bdag kyang dbang bskur te //
T02TD1926E:33b-3: bdag la don mchog stsal du gsol //
T02TD1926E:33b-4: gtso la yon sogs rab tu dbul //
T02TD1926E:33b-5: gtang sems yang dag bskyed par bya //
T02TD1926E:33b-6: de yi snying gar rdo rje ni //
T02TD1926E:33b-7: me tog bcas pa'i snying por bzhag //
T02TD1926E:33b-9: autp'a y'a mi su ra ta sa ma ya stv'am ho sidhi badzra ya th'a su kham /
T02TD1926E:33b-10: de ring khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur //
T02TD1926E:33b-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i gsang chen 'di //
T02TD1926E:33b-12: dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pa rnams la smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1926E:33b-13: dad pa med pa la yang mi rung ngo //
T02TD1926E:33b-15: tho sogs sngags kyis drang bya zhing //
T02TD1926E:33b-16: yi ge gsum gyis gzhug par bya //
T02TD1926E:33b-17: nang du sdom pa 'dzin du gzhug / de nas tshig 'di brjod par bya //
T02TD1926E:33b-18: de ring khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs la rab tu chud do //
T02TD1926E:33b-19: de bas bdag gis khyod kyi rdo rje ye shes bskyed par bya'o //
T02TD1926E:33b-20: ye shes gang gis khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyang thob par bya ste //
T02TD1926E:33b-21: gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos //
T02TD1926E:33b-22: dngos grub 'di ni khyod kyis dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams kyi mdun du smra bar mi bya'o //
T02TD1926E:33b-23: khyod ni dam tshig la 'da' bar mi rung ngo //
T02TD1926E:33b-24: de ring rdo rje sems dpa' nyid //
T02TD1926E:33b-25: khyod kyi snying la yang dag gnas //
T02TD1926E:33b-26: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
T02TD1926E:33b-27: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
T02TD1926E:33b-29: pad gnas yig gsum 'bar ba yi //
T02TD1926E:33b-30: bdud rtsi lnga ni 'thung bcug ste //
T02TD1926E:33b-31: 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu //
T02TD1926E:33b-32: dam tshig 'das na sreg par byed //
T02TD1926E:33b-33: dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni //
T02TD1926E:33b-35: aom badzrod ka tha: de nas 'di skad smra bar bya'o //
T02TD1926E:33b-36: de ring phan chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis //
T02TD1926E:33b-37: ngas ci smras pa'i bya ba 'di khyod kyis bya dgos so //
T02TD1926E:33b-38: nga la yang brnyas par ma byed cig / mi bde ba ma spangs par shi ba'i dus byas te /
T02TD1926E:33b-39: dmyal bar ltung bar ma 'gro shig / de nas de ltar smra ba la //
T02TD1926E:33b-40: slob mas 'di ltar smra bar bya'o //
T02TD1926E:33b-41: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs nas /
T02TD1926E:33b-42: rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig / ces smra bar bya'o //
T02TD1926E:34a-3: yi ge bzhi la dbyibs mdog ldan //
T02TD1926E:34a-4: ba dan la sogs mtshan byas pa //
T02TD1926E:34a-5: bsams te rlung la sogs bskyod pa //
T02TD1926E:34a-6: rdo ba dag kyang 'bab gyur na //
T02TD1926E:34a-7: sems ldan 'bab pa ci zhig smos //
T02TD1926E:34a-8: ye shes babs nas 'phar gyur na //
T02TD1926E:34a-10: lce la yi ge aa bsams te /
T02TD1926E:34a-11: dge dang mi dge dri bar bya //
T02TD1926E:34a-12: de nas mig gi snang ba dri //
T02TD1926E:34a-13: me tog 'khor lo la dor nas //
T02TD1926E:34a-14: pra t'i tstsha badzra ho zhes brjod //
T02TD1926E:34a-15: slar yang blangs la mgor bcings la //
T02TD1926E:34a-16: pra ti grihna la sogs brjod //
T02TD1926E:34a-17: mtshan ma gang la bab pa ste //
T02TD1926E:34a-18: de ni de yi lha ru sbyin //
T02TD1926E:34a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyis khyod //
T02TD1926E:34a-21: de ring nan tan mig phye'o //
T02TD1926E:34a-22: bla na med pa'i rdo rje'i mig //
T02TD1926E:34a-23: thams cad rab tu phye bar 'gyur //
T02TD1926E:34a-26: da ni dad par rab tu bskyed //
T02TD1926E:34a-27: sangs rgyas gdung gi rigs su 'khrungs //
T02TD1926E:34a-28: sngags dang phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs //
T02TD1926E:34a-29: 'gro ba phun tshogs dngos grub kyang //
T02TD1926E:34a-30: khyod la mngon du phyogs par 'gyur //
T02TD1926E:34a-31: dngos grub thob phyir dam tshig skyongs //
T02TD1926E:34a-32: gsang sngags la yang brtson par gyis //
T02TD1926E:34a-33: ral gri gshin dgra nas brtsams nas //
T02TD1926E:34a-34: ji srid gtso bo'i mthar thug par //
T02TD1926E:34a-36: spyi bor chu yis gtor bya zhing //
T02TD1926E:34a-38: dbu rgyan dbang yang de bzhin te //
T02TD1926E:34a-39: de nas rdo rje sbyin par bya //
T02TD1926E:34a-40: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
T02TD1926E:34a-41: de ring khyod la sbyin par bya //
T02TD1926E:34a-42: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1926E:34a-43: rdo rje zungs shig rab grub phyir //
T02TD1926E:34a-44: rdo rje dril bu 'khyud byas nas //
T02TD1926E:34a-45: bdag po'i dbang yang bskur bar bya //
T02TD1926E:34a-46: aom badzra aadhi pa ti tvam aa phi shinytsa m'am /
T02TD1926E:34a-47: spyi bor gdab tshul ming dbang bskur //
T02TD1926E:34a-48: tishtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
T02TD1926E:34a-49: aom badzra sa tva tvam aa bhi shinytsa mi //
T02TD1926E:34a-50: badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
T02TD1926E:34a-51: slob dpon gang dang gang dag gi //
T02TD1926E:34a-52: lhag pa'i lha ni gang gang gi //
T02TD1926E:34a-53: de nas de yi mtshan dag ni //
T02TD1926E:34a-54: dpal dang kye yis mdzes par bya //
T02TD1926E:34a-55: rig pa'i dbang lnga byin nas su //
T02TD1926E:34a-56: rig sbyor brtul zhugs lung bstan dang //
T02TD1926E:34a-57: dbugs dbyung dang ni gsum du 'dod //
T02TD1926E:34a-58: h'um gis rdo rje de bskyed la //
T02TD1926E:34a-59: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad de //
T02TD1926E:34b-0: phyag @34b na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug //
T02TD1926E:34b-1: khyod kyis rtag tu gzung bar bya //
T02TD1926E:34b-2: phyag na rdo rje brtul zhugs brtan //
T02TD1926E:34b-3: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha mam /
T02TD1926E:34b-4: ae sha stvam dha ra y'a mi badzra sa tva hi hi hi hi h'um /
T02TD1926E:34b-5: thog ma tha ma med pa yi //
T02TD1926E:34b-6: rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che //
T02TD1926E:34b-7: kun du bzang po kun bdag nyid //
T02TD1926E:34b-8: rdo rje snyems bdag bdag mdzod cig //
T02TD1926E:34b-9: chos kyi dril bu gzung bar bya //
T02TD1926E:34b-10: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
T02TD1926E:34b-11: shes rab rjes 'gro ba yi dbyangs //
T02TD1926E:34b-12: rtag par khyod kyis kyang gzung ste //
T02TD1926E:34b-13: rgyal ba byang chub mchog tu bzhed //
T02TD1926E:34b-14: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
T02TD1926E:34b-15: srid pa rang bzhin gyis dag phyir //
T02TD1926E:34b-16: rang bzhin gyis ni 'byung bar byed //
T02TD1926E:34b-17: rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog / srid pa'i mchog ni 'grub par byed //
T02TD1926E:34b-18: srid pa'i bde ba shin tu chung //
T02TD1926E:34b-19: sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir //
T02TD1926E:34b-20: shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs //
T02TD1926E:34b-21: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed //
T02TD1926E:34b-22: 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la //
T02TD1926E:34b-23: ci 'dod par ni bstan bzhin du //
T02TD1926E:34b-24: rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis //
T02TD1926E:34b-25: bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya //
T02TD1926E:34b-26: ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni //
T02TD1926E:34b-27: mkhas mchog bzhugs par gyur gyi tshe //
T02TD1926E:34b-28: de srid mtshungs med sems can don //
T02TD1926E:34b-29: mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus //
T02TD1926E:34b-30: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs //
T02TD1926E:34b-31: bsod nams byin brlabs kyis bsgrubs la //
T02TD1926E:34b-32: dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed //
T02TD1926E:34b-33: dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs //
T02TD1926E:34b-34: phyag rgya chen po'i brtul zhugs ni //
T02TD1926E:34b-35: de yis rab tu sbyin par bya //
T02TD1926E:34b-36: de nas sdom bzung yon phul te //
T02TD1926E:34b-37: phyag byas tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1926E:34b-38: byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la //
T02TD1926E:34b-39: ji ltar mchod chen bgyis pa ltar //
T02TD1926E:34b-40: bdag kyang rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir //
T02TD1926E:34b-41: nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol //
T02TD1926E:34b-43: dar gyis bkab par 'dug byas la //
T02TD1926E:34b-44: bkra shis tshigs bcad glu sgra dang //
T02TD1926E:34b-45: rdo rje dril bu gsil ba yis //
T02TD1926E:34b-46: skyob pa kun gyis mngon sum du //
T02TD1926E:34b-47: til gyi gang bu bzhin gang ba'i //
T02TD1926E:34b-48: rgyal bas bum pa bzung nas su //
T02TD1926E:34b-49: de nyid la ni dbang bskur bas //
T02TD1926E:34b-50: dkyil 'khor de nyid rig par bsam //
T02TD1926E:34b-51: chu dang dbu rgyan sngon bzhin te //
T02TD1926E:34b-52: rdo rje dril bu tshig 'dis sbyin //
T02TD1926E:35a-2: grub pa'i rdo rje dril bu 'di //
T02TD1926E:35a-3: khyod kyis dad pas rab zung la //
T02TD1926E:35a-4: rdo rje khyod kyis slob ma bsdus //
T02TD1926E:35a-5: ming yang sngon dang 'dra bar sbyin //
T02TD1926E:35a-6: de nas bla mas tshig 'di brjod //
T02TD1926E:35a-7: sangs rgyas kun gyi ral gri che //
T02TD1926E:35a-8: khams gsum kun gyis phyag byas pa //
T02TD1926E:35a-9: las kyi ral gri gcig pu mchog / bdud rnams las ni rgyal bzung //
T02TD1926E:35a-10: dkyil 'khor de bzhin nyid bstan pa //
T02TD1926E:35a-11: mnyam pa nyid phyir gru bzhi ste //
T02TD1926E:35a-12: nye bar bzhag dang yang dag spong //
T02TD1926E:35a-13: rdzu 'phrul rkang pa dang dbang po //
T02TD1926E:35a-14: go rims bzhin du sgo bzhi'o //
T02TD1926E:35a-15: bsam gtan bzhi ni rta babs te //
T02TD1926E:35a-16: ting nge 'dzin bzhi kha khyer yin //
T02TD1926E:35a-17: de rten gzungs kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1926E:35a-18: 'gro kun gdul phyir phyogs sgo na //
T02TD1926E:35a-19: rlung gis bskyod pa'i dril sgra sgrogs //
T02TD1926E:35a-20: byang chub yan lag rnam dag phyir //
T02TD1926E:35a-21: dra ba dra phyed la sogs spras //
T02TD1926E:35a-22: rnam thar brgyad ldan ka ba ste //
T02TD1926E:35a-23: rgyan bkod bkra bas mdzes pa ni //
T02TD1926E:35a-24: bsam pa thams cad yongs bskong phyir //
T02TD1926E:35a-25: sna tshogs las kyi mthar thug phyir //
T02TD1926E:35a-26: pho brang sna tshogs rdo rje 'bar //
T02TD1926E:35a-27: theg chen 'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir //
T02TD1926E:35a-28: rdo rje'i phreng bas yongs su bskor //
T02TD1926E:35a-29: sems can sems ni dgrol bya'i phyir //
T02TD1926E:35a-30: tshon rnams ye shes lnga yin no //
T02TD1926E:35a-31: dam pa'i tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i phyir //
T02TD1926E:35a-32: byang chub sems gang ka p'a la //
T02TD1926E:35a-33: bdug pa me tog mar me dang //
T02TD1926E:35a-34: bshos dang byug pa la sogs ni //
T02TD1926E:35a-35: snyan grags byang chub yan lag dang //
T02TD1926E:35a-36: dga' dang chos zas lus bde yin //
T02TD1926E:35a-37: ngo tsha khrel yod sdom pa yis //
T02TD1926E:35a-38: bde bskyed dbyangs dang gar sogs yin //
T02TD1926E:35a-39: sangs rgyas bzhugs phyir gzhal yas khang //
T02TD1926E:35a-40: snying po lan phyir dkyil 'khor ro //
T02TD1926E:35a-41: lha yi de nyid bstan bya ba //
T02TD1926E:35a-43: stobs rnams dag pa sgor gnas bzhi //
T02TD1926E:35a-44: byams sogs tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi //
T02TD1926E:35a-45: rtsa rtsi k'a sogs lha mo bzhi //
T02TD1926E:35a-46: shin tu rnam dag la sogs lnga //
T02TD1926E:35a-47: zhe sdang gshin rje la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1926E:35a-49: nyi zla byang chub sems myu gu //
T02TD1926E:35a-50: gso dang smin par byed pa'o //
T02TD1926E:35a-51: de nas byad dang na sor ldan //
T02TD1926E:35a-52: ri dags lte ba'i dri mnam dang //
T02TD1926E:35b-0: gser gyi rna cha g-yo ba zhig / gcig cig legs btsal @35b dbul bar bya //
T02TD1926E:35b-1: bla mas bzhes te byin brlabs la //
T02TD1926E:35b-2: sbyor ba'i cho gas mnyes par bya //
T02TD1926E:35b-3: bde ba mthe bong srin lag gis //
T02TD1926E:35b-4: slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya //
T02TD1926E:35b-5: bde ba'i btung ba rin chen de //
T02TD1926E:35b-6: brtan pa'i blo yis btung bar bya //
T02TD1926E:35b-7: aa ho su kha zhes kyang smra //
T02TD1926E:35b-8: de nas bu mo mig yangs mo //
T02TD1926E:35b-9: mdzes shing nu ma rgyas pa zhig / rang gi bu la sbyin par bya //
T02TD1926E:35b-10: mgo bor lag bzhag gsang ba gtad //
T02TD1926E:35b-11: de yi gzungs ma legs sbyin mo //
T02TD1926E:35b-12: de dang bde ba myang bar bya //
T02TD1926E:35b-13: de nas slob dpon shes rab dang //
T02TD1926E:35b-14: bcas pas dkyil 'khor lha de nyid //
T02TD1926E:35b-15: slob dpon las rnams bstan par bya //
T02TD1926E:35b-16: ji ltar dbang bskur la sogs 'dis //
T02TD1926E:35b-17: sangs rgyas sogs kun thob pa bzhin //
T02TD1926E:35b-18: byang chub spyod sogs gzhan dag dang //
T02TD1926E:35b-19: 'dul sogs dge bas de bzhin min //
T02TD1926E:35b-20: de bas dam tshig bus srungs shig / rtag tu sdom pa yang bsrung ngo //
T02TD1926E:35b-21: sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga bza' ste //
T02TD1926E:35b-22: de las gzhan pa'i dam tshig bsrung //
T02TD1926E:35b-23: dkon mchog gnod pa gsad bya ste //
T02TD1926E:35b-24: bud med kun kyang spyad par bya //
T02TD1926E:35b-25: pha rol nor yang blangs nas su //
T02TD1926E:35b-26: rtag tu rdzun gyi tshig kyang smra //
T02TD1926E:35b-28: de ni cho ga bzhin du bsrung //
T02TD1926E:35b-29: de nas de bzhin gyur nas //
T02TD1926E:35b-30: lung bstan pa ni bya ba yin //
T02TD1926E:35b-31: g-yon gyis snying gar chos gos gzung //
T02TD1926E:35b-32: g-yas pa yis ni mchog sbyin bya //
T02TD1926E:35b-34: ngas khyod 'di ltar lung bstan yin //
T02TD1926E:35b-35: srid pa'i ngan 'gro rnams las bton //
T02TD1926E:35b-36: srid pa'i mchog tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1926E:35b-37: rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1926E:35b-38: kye gshin rje mthar 'byin pa ni bhur bhu ba sva: de ltar lung bstan bsngags pa de //
T02TD1926E:35b-39: bla med nyid du lung bstan yin //
T02TD1926E:35b-40: de nas dbugs dbyung sbyin bya ste //
T02TD1926E:35b-41: gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
T02TD1926E:35b-42: mthong ba dad ni zhugs gyur pas //
T02TD1926E:35b-43: sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing //
T02TD1926E:35b-44: khyed rnams de nyid legs par gnas //
T02TD1926E:35b-45: bde chen theg pa 'di la ni //
T02TD1926E:35b-46: slar 'chi ba ni yod med de //
T02TD1926E:35b-47: mi tshugs pa dang mi song bas //
T02TD1926E:35b-48: cis kyang mi 'jigs dga' bar gyis //
T02TD1926E:35b-49: srid pa shin tu dag pa'i phyir //
T02TD1926E:35b-50: srid pa'i sdug bsngal las khyod bton //
T02TD1926E:35b-51: srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir //
T02TD1926E:35b-52: rtog pa mchog tu gyur pa yis //
T02TD1926E:36a-2: rtag tu khyod kyis bsrung bar bya //
T02TD1926E:36a-3: sangs rgyas kun gyis mthun par gsungs //
T02TD1926E:36a-4: gang zhig bskyed pa tsam gyis su //
T02TD1926E:36a-5: sangs rgyas nyid du dogs med pa'i //
T02TD1926E:36a-6: byang chub sems ni btang mi bya //
T02TD1926E:36a-7: phyag na rdo rje gang yin pa'i //
T02TD1926E:36a-8: de la sogs pa'i bka' stsal ni ;
T02TD1926E:36a-9: / ci rigs par ni brjod par bya //
T02TD1926E:36a-10: de ltar bka' stsal thob pa dang //
T02TD1926E:36a-11: slob ma gus dang ldan pa yis //
T02TD1926E:36a-12: bla ma'i rkang par phyag byas la //
T02TD1926E:36a-13: thams cad bsgrub par khas blang ngo //
T02TD1926E:36a-14: de nas zhi ba'i sbyin sreg ni //
T02TD1926E:36a-15: ci nus pa yang bya ba ste //
T02TD1926E:36a-16: slob ma g-yon phyogs bzhag nas su //
T02TD1926E:36a-17: de yi srin lag nas bzung la //
T02TD1926E:36a-18: sbyin sreg bsang dang bsrung ba dang //
T02TD1926E:36a-19: me tog bsdus te bla ma la //
T02TD1926E:36a-20: phul la mer dor smon lam bya //
T02TD1926E:36a-21: de ltar bya ba kun zin nas //
T02TD1926E:36a-22: de nyid gsum mthar mu: ldan pas //
T02TD1926E:36a-23: ye shes sems dpa' gshegs par bskul //
T02TD1926E:36a-24: de dang mthun par bskyed par bsdu ;
T02TD1926E:36a-25: / thog mar aa ldan gsang sngags kyis //
T02TD1926E:36a-26: rdul tshon bsgrims te bsdu bar bya //
T02TD1926E:36a-27: rol mo bcas pas spyan drangs la //
T02TD1926E:36a-28: k'i li k'i lis chu bor dor //
T02TD1926E:36a-29: rdo rje'i skam khas phur bu gdon //
T02TD1926E:36a-30: rig pa spyan bzlas 'o mas bkru //
T02TD1926E:36a-31: ba yi lci bas dkyil 'khor byug / de steng dga' ston la sogs bya //
T02TD1926E:36a-32: dkyil 'khor gyi ni yo byad kun //
T02TD1926E:36a-33: rdo rje slob dpon dbang bar bshad //
T02TD1926E:36a-34: de ltar bya ba las dang po'i //
T02TD1926E:36a-35: rnal 'byor pa yi bya ba yin //
T02TD1926E:36a-36: gzhan dag dbab dang sems nyid kyis //
T02TD1926E:36a-37: byas pa rmad du byung ba yin //
T02TD1926E:36a-38: de ltar dbang thob slob ma de //
T02TD1926E:36a-40: de yis bsgrub pa 'bras bcas phyir //
T02TD1926E:36a-41: des ni bsgrub pa brtsam par bya //
T02TD1926E:36a-42: las kyi mthar thug rgyud 'di ru //
T02TD1926E:36a-43: thun mong ma yin 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1926E:36a-44: dgos pa ma lus kun byed pa //
T02TD1926E:36a-45: de 'dir bdag gis bri bar bya //
T02TD1926E:36a-46: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pas //
T02TD1926E:36a-47: legs byugs dur khrod ras ma la //
T02TD1926E:36a-48: dug dang nim pa'i khu ba dang //
T02TD1926E:36a-49: khrag dang dur khrod sol ba dang //
T02TD1926E:36a-50: da du ra sogs snag tsha dang //
T02TD1926E:36a-51: rus pa'i smyu gus bri bya ba //
T02TD1926E:36a-52: gcer bu skra bshig gdong bsnyer te //
T02TD1926E:36a-53: khros pas lho ru mngon phyogs la //
T02TD1926E:36a-54: sngags bzlas rtse gcig pa yis bri //
T02TD1926E:36b-0: zlum por bskor ba @36b gsum bya ste //
T02TD1926E:36b-1: dgu dang bcu gnyis bcu drug ste //
T02TD1926E:36b-2: le tshe rnams ni byas pa la //
T02TD1926E:36b-3: yi ge gsang sngags sa bon bri //
T02TD1926E:36b-4: dbus su zhe sdang rdo rje nyid //
T02TD1926E:36b-6: shar du gti mug rdo rje ste //
T02TD1926E:36b-7: lhor ni ser sna rdo rje yin //
T02TD1926E:36b-8: nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje la //
T02TD1926E:36b-9: byang du phrag dog rdo rje'o //
T02TD1926E:36b-10: kshe ma me da gnyis pa yi //
T02TD1926E:36b-11: gnyis pa'i phyogs bzhir lhor brtsams nas //
T02TD1926E:36b-12: shar gyi phyogs la thug gi bar //
T02TD1926E:36b-13: khro bo yum dang snod dag gi //
T02TD1926E:36b-14: re re'i gong ma mas rim bzhin //
T02TD1926E:36b-16: mtshams kyi le tshe brgyad po la //
T02TD1926E:36b-17: bden bral mtshams na lha mo gnyis //
T02TD1926E:36b-18: rlung gnas mdzod ldan me mtshams snod //
T02TD1926E:36b-19: dbang ldan na ni thod pa gnyis //
T02TD1926E:36b-20: me mtshams na ni sgo srung gnyis //
T02TD1926E:36b-22: sa ru na ni ratstsha ni //
T02TD1926E:36b-23: kun ming thog ma dbus su ste //
T02TD1926E:36b-25: lho ru ser sna ral gri 'dzin //
T02TD1926E:36b-26: nub tu chags dang dbyangs can ma //
T02TD1926E:36b-27: byang du phrag dog bden bral snod //
T02TD1926E:36b-28: shar du gti mug dang tho ba ;
T02TD1926E:36b-29: / mar me do yo kshe ya //
T02TD1926E:36b-30: sngags ming bskul tshig bcas pa dang //
T02TD1926E:36b-31: yi ge gnyis par ming bcug pa //
T02TD1926E:36b-32: spel zhing spel zhing bri bar bya //
T02TD1926E:36b-33: de ltar bris pa'i 'khor lo ni //
T02TD1926E:36b-34: lugs dang lugs min par byas la //
T02TD1926E:36b-35: do da yo kshe ya gnas la //
T02TD1926E:36b-36: gnas pa phyi nang so so yi //
T02TD1926E:36b-37: phyogs mtshams bye brag bklag pa dang //
T02TD1926E:36b-38: phyi nang thun mong phyogs mtshams su //
T02TD1926E:36b-39: bklag pa dag ste gnyis su 'dod //
T02TD1926E:36b-40: gnas pa sde tshan so so ni //
T02TD1926E:36b-41: gtso bo khro bo lha mo dang //
T02TD1926E:36b-42: bandha bzhi ru shes bya ste //
T02TD1926E:36b-43: sdom dang so sor bklag par bya //
T02TD1926E:36b-44: ya kshe ma me da p'atstsha ni r'a //
T02TD1926E:36b-45: dz'a sa do ru na yo ni ra //
T02TD1926E:36b-46: yi ge bcu bdun dbang byas nas //
T02TD1926E:36b-47: rnam pa dgu ru bklag pa yin //
T02TD1926E:36b-48: rtsa ba'i sngags su gdon pa la //
T02TD1926E:36b-49: yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis kyang //
T02TD1926E:36b-50: rkang pa bzhi ru gdon pa dang //
T02TD1926E:36b-51: so sor phye ste gdon pa'o //
T02TD1926E:36b-52: ya ma r'a dza la sogs pa'o //
T02TD1926E:36b-53: dang po dang 'og mtha' ltag mtha' //
T02TD1926E:36b-54: gtso bo lnga ru bstan pa yin //
T02TD1926E:36b-55: dang po tha ma yi ge brgyad //
T02TD1926E:36b-56: gshin rje dgra nyid shes par bya //
T02TD1926E:36b-59: dang po mgo mtha' mtha' ma'i ltag //
T02TD1926E:36b-60: ser sna rdo rje yin par 'dod //
T02TD1926E:36b-62: dang po'i mtha' ltag gnyis dang mgo //
T02TD1926E:36b-63: 'dod chags rdo rje'i yi ge yin //
T02TD1926E:37a-1: mtha' ltag gsum dang 'og / phrag dog nyid du bstan pa yin //
T02TD1926E:37a-3: gsum pa'i mtha' ltag bzhi dang 'og / gti mug rdo rje'i yi ge yin //
T02TD1926E:37a-5: rkang pa dang po'i dbu ma bzhi //
T02TD1926E:37a-6: khro bo gcig dang lha mo gsum //
T02TD1926E:37a-8: rkang pa gnyis pa'i dbu ma bzhi ;
T02TD1926E:37a-9: / lha mo gnyis dang thod pa gnyis //
T02TD1926E:37a-11: rkang pa gsum pa'i dbu ma bzhi //
T02TD1926E:37a-12: snod chen gsum dang khro bo gcig //
T02TD1926E:37a-14: rkang pa bzhi pa'i dbu ma bzhi //
T02TD1926E:37a-15: khro bo bzhi ru shes par bya //
T02TD1926E:37a-17: 'jug pa dang ni ldog pa dang //
T02TD1926E:37a-19: thun mong dang ni rnam pa drug / gcig gnyis gsum bzhi gong nas 'phel //
T02TD1926E:37a-20: gsum gnyis gcig dang zad mthar thug / r'a do ru yo /
T02TD1926E:37a-22: dz'a sa do na yo ya /
T02TD1926E:37a-23: mtha' ma gcig dang gong ma gsum //
T02TD1926E:37a-24: 'og ma gnyis dang gong ma gnyis //
T02TD1926E:37a-25: 'og ma gsum dang dang po gcig //
T02TD1926E:37a-27: 'jug dang ldog dang thun mong ni //
T02TD1926E:37a-28: gong du bstan pas shes bya ste //
T02TD1926E:37a-29: 'jug ldog phyogs kyi gtso bo la //
T02TD1926E:37a-30: thun mong phyi yi phyogs la'o //
T02TD1926E:37a-31: dgu dang brgyad kyi yi ge ni //
T02TD1926E:37a-32: bcu bdun dag ste lha ru 'dod //
T02TD1926E:37a-33: re re'ang mgo dang mthar ldan par //
T02TD1926E:37a-34: gsang sngags gdon par bya ba yin //
T02TD1926E:37a-35: dbus kyi phyogs min stong pa ru //
T02TD1926E:37a-36: sa bon gnyis par ming spel bri //
T02TD1926E:37a-37: rim pa gsum pa'i le tse ni //
T02TD1926E:37a-38: bcu drug pa la bri bya ba //
T02TD1926E:37a-39: sngags ming bskul tshig bcas pa dang //
T02TD1926E:37a-40: yi ge gnyis par ming bcug pa //
T02TD1926E:37a-41: spel zhing spel zhing bri bar bya //
T02TD1926E:37a-42: de ltar bris pa'i 'khor lo ni ;
T02TD1926E:37a-43: / lugs dang lugs min gnyis byas la //
T02TD1926E:37a-44: so sor mthun par mgo sprad la //
T02TD1926E:37a-45: til te phyi rol mar khus byug //
T02TD1926E:37a-46: thod pa gnyis ni kha sbyar bar //
T02TD1926E:37a-47: mar khus khrag blugs der bcug la //
T02TD1926E:37a-48: skud pa sngon pos khris bdun dkri //
T02TD1926E:37a-49: de la me tog nag po dang //
T02TD1926E:37a-50: dus sogs nag pos mchod par bya //
T02TD1926E:37a-51: rgyal po'i sgo khang sa dang ni //
T02TD1926E:37a-52: grog khyim la sogs sa dag las //
T02TD1926E:37a-53: gshin rje'i dgra yi sku bya ba //
T02TD1926E:37a-54: 'khrugs pa zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa //
T02TD1926E:37a-55: khru gang tsam gyi tshad byas la //
T02TD1926E:37a-56: de yi mdun du dkyil 'khor ni //
T02TD1926E:37a-57: gnag pa khrag gis chag chag can //
T02TD1926E:37a-58: byas la de steng spos chen dbul //
T02TD1926E:37b-0: @37b de nas bdag gi gsang sngags ni //
T02TD1926E:37b-1: bskul tshig ldan par rab tu bzlas //
T02TD1926E:37b-2: khro bo'i rgyun ni rnam spros te //
T02TD1926E:37b-3: gzas pa'i lus las go cha dang //
T02TD1926E:37b-4: srung ba phrogs nas bdag la thim //
T02TD1926E:37b-5: de nas de ni gos med cing //
T02TD1926E:37b-6: sdug bsngal sna tshogs pas gzir bsam //
T02TD1926E:37b-7: de bkug mthar byed lto bar gzhug ;
T02TD1926E:37b-8: / khro bo gcan gzan sna tshogs kyis //
T02TD1926E:37b-9: gshin rje gshed kyi lto ba nas //
T02TD1926E:37b-10: rkang dang rgyu ma khrag tshil bu //
T02TD1926E:37b-11: phyogs bcur khyer nas 'gro bar bsam //
T02TD1926E:37b-12: de ltar brtan par gyur pa dang //
T02TD1926E:37b-13: shing gcig dur khrod la sogs par //
T02TD1926E:37b-14: gshin rje'i lto bar bcug la sba //
T02TD1926E:37b-16: so so'i bye brag shes byas la //
T02TD1926E:37b-17: zhi sogs las rnams thams cad ni //
T02TD1926E:37b-18: ji ltar mngon par dga' bar bya //
T02TD1926E:37b-19: la li badzra zhes bya nus pa kun dang rnam bral yang //
T02TD1926E:37b-20: bla ma'i rjes 'brangs dad pas de yi phyogs tsam gzung bya ste //
T02TD1926E:37b-21: dkyil 'khor cho ga 'di byas dge ba dri med gang yin pa //
T02TD1926E:37b-22: de yi 'gro kun gshin rje ma lus mthar phyin byed gyur cig / gshin rje gshed kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga //
T02TD1926E:37b-23: gshin rje gshed 'byung ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD1926E:37b-24: slob dpon chen po la li ta badzra'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1926E:37b-26: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po aa mo gha badzra dang /
T02TD1926E:37b-27: bod kyi lo ts'a ba cog gru shes rab bla mas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
